#################################################

Release Name:
Snail.Mail.(Sandlot.Games)-WWW

Release Type: PC Game
Game: Snail Mail
Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium - 400MHz or better
RAM: 128MB
DirectX Version: 7.0 or above
Keyboard and Mouse: Supported
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Snail Mail_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

"Turbo's the name, Snail Mail's the game," he'll proclaim before launching off onto the information superhighway. Guide this spunky critter down an aerial slip 'n slide past enemies and obstacles. Watch out for dead ends and see his royal purple-ness sail, soar, and even spiral in midair! Guide Turbo the Snail through the furthest reaches of the universe to deliver his Intergalactic Mail in this fast-paced, creative racing game.

#################################################

FAQs
Q: Is this the full game?
A: Yes.

A: No.

Q: Is this multilingual?
A: No. English is the only language supported.

Q: Will this installer work on a Mac?
A: Buy me a Mac and I'll figure it out.

A: No.

Q: Will you marry me?
A: No.
